channel.title: Can you do this, and how do you do this?
channel.description:
[b][i]can[/i][/b]-you change the name of a item? [b][i]how[/i][/b]- do you change the color of a item..if you can.
and for the name changing one do you got into item.cfg and find the item and change the name?

item.title: Can you do this, and how do you do this?

item.description:

crack client isn’t a crack client seperate the words…(hack client)
and for name change I haven’t figured it out perfectly yet but its all way advanced stuff.
